Articles.Content: I just started a new playthrough. I've been ticking off the World's Firsts Record contracts. Gather Kerbin data, Launch first vessel, Escape atmosphere, Orbit Kerbin... and up pops the first level Explore Minmus/flyby. I've never noticed that happening before, skipping all the Mun exploration missions I mean. Anyone else see this happen? Did I maybe miss something? Will I still get the bonus rewards for the Mun flyby/orbit/etc. as I complete them?

Yes, you will still get all the bonuses for the Mun. And there is supposed to be a random element in choosing targets for the Explore contracts. It's not supposed to always be in the exact same order anymore.
